Package  main.java.model.brick

Class SpecialBrick

Class Declaration

public class SpecialBrick extends Brick

Represents a special type of brick that grants power-ups when broken. This brick may have extra durability or unique behavior in the game.

Field Summary

Modifier and TypeFieldDescription
private boolean hasPowerUp Indicates if the brick releases a power-up when destroyed.

Constructor Summary

ConstructorDescription
SpecialBrick(int x, int y, int width, int height) Creates a new special brick at the given position.

Method Summary

Modifier and TypeMethodDescription
public boolean isBroken() Checks if the brick is broken.
public void hit() Reduces the brick’s strength and possibly activates power-ups.

Field Detail

hasPowerUp

True if the brick spawns a power-up when destroyed.

Constructor Detail

SpecialBrick

public SpecialBrick(int x, int y, int width, int height)

Initializes a special brick at a specified position with given dimensions.

Method Detail

isBroken

public boolean isBroken()

Returns true if the brick is completely destroyed.

hit

public void hit()

Handles collision logic when the ball hits the brick and triggers effects.
